mods.abstract: The California Magazine of Western Square and Round Dancing by the Square Dancers of Southern California. This edition includes a table of contents which lists the following: SPECIAL FEATURES "Alaska, Our 49th Square Dancing State", "Denver: Convention Highlights", "Basic Rounds in St. Louis", "How to Learn Square Dance Calls", "Homes for Square Dancing, Part VI", "Value of the Club Workshop", and "The Square Dance Scene". This edition also includes the the regular features entitled "Square Dance Date Book", "From the Floor", "As I See It", "Style Series: Hand Hints", "Ladies on the Square: A Combination Slip and Pantalets", "Chuck Jones' Note Book", "Round the Outside Ring", "Caller of the Month: Dave Palmer", "Paging the Roundancers: Les and Helen Airhart", and "On the Record".
mods.accessCondition: Copyright restrictions may apply. User is responsible for all copyright compliance.
